about_the_game:
This interior tile pack comes in two varieties: Gothic Blue + Halloween Party

Create moody blue spaces, or infuse a touch of darkness to existing ones, with the tiles provided by the Gothic Blue variation; alternatively, ready your spaces for a spine-tingling adventure with the accompanying Halloween Party variations!

Inside this package you will find an assortment of interior accents such as luxurious couches and chairs, tables, wall decorations, gothic windows, wallpapers, and flooring.

Included within this pack:

* Inside_A2 (GothicBlue)
* Inside_A2 (Halloween)
* Inside_A4 (GothicBlue)
* Inside_A4 (Halloween)
* Inside_B (GothicBlue)
* Inside_B (Halloween)

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
